courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Intended for music majors in the BME instrumental concentration.
description: Class instruction in the fundamentals of playing and teaching the horn. Acquire knowledge on recommended instruments and equipment, maintenance procedures, and training materials. Prerequisite: Intended for music majors in the BME instrumental concentration.
label: Supp Brass Inst: Horn
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to BME:Music Education -UIUC, BME:MusEd:Instrmntl Music-UIUC, or BME:Mus Ed:Elem Gen Music-UIUC.
